[b]óllo, Mátes![/b]
This [b]Does not[/b] have a virus, I'm a gud boi. THIS IS A PI!
[center][size=13pt][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/center]
[center]70% Sanity.[/center] [center]20% CarlosAtheTruth [b]I got it from this dode.[/b][/center] [center]10% Dremen Rane[/center]
[center][size=13pt][b]Information:[/b][/size][/center]
This is 2006Lives! A amazing 2006 server created by Sanity, worked on by CarlosAthetruth. Then perfected by me. I like to thank Sanity for making the base, he did a decent job.
[center][b]All other things on server found here:[/b] on the sexy Development Log.:[/center]
*[b]note[/b] development log is 30% of what I wrote down.* https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,642384.30.html
[center][size=13pt][b]WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY YOU SHOULD DOWNLOAD MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS[/b][/size][/center]
Great Music System Working Specs. 2006 feel Great Commands Npc dialogues with head in chat Npc dialogue emote and player! Clean Needs work on NO shops NO NPCS NOT MUCH OBJECTS
Oh and, this is somewhat different that Sanity's base. Version 2, will be like where do I add wthis that and yeah... :P
[center][size=13pt][b]Media:[/b][/size][/center]
YES BABY [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ykMiDr0.jpg[/img]
[center][size=13pt][b]DL:[/b][/size][/center]
